item.title: Economic concepts applied in software development, reliability engineering, and technical leadership
item.description: One of my favorite subjects as a layperson is economics. I have found many useful applications of methods and concepts to my work in software development, technical leadership, and reliability engineering roles. This is a post to share some of these. A few ideas from economics: an overview Below is an overview of ideas from economics that have resonated with me at work: Opportunity cost Looking at what you lose by choosing a specific activity over others.
